t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia

t: Jeff Bezos - Wikipedia
s: 2 days ago - Jeffrey Preston Bezos (/ˈbeɪzoʊs/ BAY-zohss; né Jorgensen; born January 12, 1964) is an American businessman best known as the founder, executive chairman, and former president and CEO of Amazon, the world's largest e-commerce and cloud computing company.

t: How much money does Amazon founder Jeff Bezos have? This is his huge fortune at 61 years old - AS USA
s: January 13, 2025 - Jeff Bezos built most of his wealth as the CEO and founder of Amazon. Similar to many other billionaires, his riches largely come from the stocks he owns rather than from his salary. Between 1998 and 2021, Bezos had a base salary of $88,840, with total compensation exceeding $1.6 million each year.
